= Distrobox Installation und Verwendung =

== Installation ==
{{{class="brush: bash"
sudo pacman -S distrobox
}}}

== Container erstellen (Beispiele) ==
{{{class="brush: bash"
distrobox create -n fedora-39 --nvidia --image fedora:39
distrobox create -n arch --nvidia --image archlinux:latest
distrobox create -n ubuntu --nvidia --image ubuntu:latest
distrobox create -n fedora-39-custom --nvidia --image fedora:39 --no-home
distrobox create -n cent --nvidia --image centos:stream8
distrobox create -n rocky-9 --nvidia --image rockylinux:9
}}}

== Grundbefehle ==
{{{class="brush: bash"
distrobox list # Alle Container anzeigen
distrobox enter <NAME> # Container betreten
distrobox stop <NAME> # Container stoppen
distrobox rm <NAME> # Container entfernen
}}}

== Container stoppen ==
{{{class="brush: bash"
distrobox rm -f <Name>
}}}
